author: Al Jazeera
title: Turkey dubs Russia invasion of Ukraine ‘war’ in shift of rhetoric
description: The decision could pave way for the NATO member state to enact an international pact limiting Russian naval passage.
content: Turkey has called Russias assault on Ukraine a war in a rhetorical shift that could pave the way for the NATO member nation to implement parts of an international pact, potentially limiting the trans… [+1920 chars]
